dblclick.message: Double Click juu ya neno kutafsiri

description.message: Ddict husaidia instantly kutafsiri Nakala kwenye tovuti au files PDF na click mara mbili au keypress.

note.message: Haja na kupata mahitaji tabo wote kuomba mazingira hapo juu.

shift.message: Highlight Nakala basi vyombo vya habari "Shift" button kutafsiri
